Features
Features: Keyboard:
HERMES E1A comes with GAMDIAS certified Mem-chanical switches, not only does this offers the switch a longer life cycle than a normal membrane switch, it also mimics the clicky tactile feedback of a mechanical switch, without key caps bottoming out! 

HERMES E1A brought up your true color and style with zoned backlighting system with multiple lighting effects, 4 brightness levels to adjust, and 10Fn+Function keys for multi-media. 

The HERMES E1A features multiple drainage holes at the bottom help liquid drain out and protect the keyboard against accidental spills.

Mouse:
Maxing out at 3,200 dpi, it has centered dpi control button that allows you to change the sensitivity of your mouse on the fly. 

Keeping your hand comfortable in the heat of the battle is one of our top priorities. To achieve this, we’ve designed the ZEUS E2 mouse with the hands natural curvature and structure in mind.

Mouse Mat:
Double-layer fabrics to ease the pressure on your wrist during gameplay. With non-slip rubber back you'll be confident in your mouse movement knowing your mouse pad wont move out of place.


Group
